aiDraft:
SUBJECT: Gideon - quick question

Hi Gideon,

I've been following information technology & services companies in Nigeria.

I'm David Ariyo, Full Stack Developer. Recently built DAstore E-Commerce Platform - Luxury e-commerce with 140+ products, payment processing, cart management.

Tech: Next.js, MongoDB, REST API, JWT | 140+ products, 7 categories

Noticed you use Google Analytics - I've worked with similar systems.

Based in Nigeria too - always excited to support local tech growth.

Ever need freelance dev support at R3 CONSULTING LTD?

Best,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer | MERN Stack
